name: Rail Shooter
description:
This piece of garbage is Rail Shooter, where you have a gun and you are on a train. Shoot the people jumping on your train because... they're invading your personal space.

it is made up entirely of placeholder assets, there are exactly two textures in the entire game, the options button in the menu doesn't do anything, there is no real goal and enemies are actually kind of pointless as they currently deal only one thing of damage. 

But it's 2017 and anyone can upload anything to the internet and call it a game, so here we are.

Criticism is begrudgingly gratefully accepted.
